初遇.encontent:
I am Druvis III. It's my pleasure to meet you. ...
 You said I didn't look very pleased? Hah ... How about
 now?
初遇.content:
我是槲寄生，很高兴认识你。……你说看不出我很高兴？呵
……那么现在呢？

箱中气候.encontent:
Water travels from the ground to the sky, and then
 falls back; just as I, who come from the forest, and
 now go back.
箱中气候.content:
水从泥土里去往天上，又从天上坠落地面。如同我从林中
来，又向林中去。

致未来.encontent:
Perhaps when the dream of industrial society is realized,no
 one will ever cut down the dense forest. I am looking
 forward to that day.
致未来.content:
或许，在工业之梦结束的那日。没有人再会伐尽茂密的林
海。我期待着那一天。

孑立.encontent:
... Are you also listening to the wind dancing on the
 treetops?
孑立.content: ……您也在聆听窗外树梢间的风声吗？

问候.encontent: You brought me a gentle breeze on the field.
问候.content: 你带来了一缕原野的风。

朝晨.encontent:
When the sun rose, the beasts kept silence. Then, I
 heard a bird flapping its wings. It's the first to
 leave the forest.
朝晨.content:
太阳升起，野兽们噤声不吠。而后，我听见第一只离林之
鸟振翅的声响。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
If you are lazier and get up even later, you won't
 see such a beautiful sunrise.  ... Does it matter?
信任-朝晨.content:
如果更晚、更怠惰，您就看不到那样美丽的日出了，没有
关系吗？

夜暮.encontent:
Tides of time rise and fall. Days and nights switch
 and whirl. The infinite loop will never come to an
 end.
夜暮.content: 时代的潮水不断起落，正如日夜更迭流转，永无止息。

信任-夜暮.encontent:
The night falls. The beasts howl. The owls sob. Their
 feet treading on the ground are just like the roots
 embedded into the soil.
信任-夜暮.content:
夜幕降临了，野兽嘶鸣，夜枭呜咽。它们的脚步踏在大地
上，如同树木的根须扎入泥土中。

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
The green eyes are inherited from my mother. Although I did not
 grow into a lady of the upper class as she wished ... ... I
 thank my mother for everything she left.
帽檐与发鬓.content:
绿色的眼睛遗传自我的母亲。虽然我没有如她所愿地成为
上流社会的淑女，但是我感谢母亲留给我的一切。

袖与手.encontent:
When I first saw trees and grass, I knew my life belonged
 to them.
袖与手.content:
当我第一次接触到自然的草木时，我就知道我的生命属于
它们。

衣着与身形.encontent:
Gowns and heels will not stop me. I will jump into
 the woods, as I have done this countless times.
衣着与身形.content:
礼服与鞋跟不会阻挡我的步伐，我能在林间跳跃，因为我
曾经无数次地这么做过。

嗜好.encontent:
It is a pleasure to be alone in the forest. In a flash,
 cards of days and nights are shuffled.
嗜好.content:
在林中独处是一种享受。从旦通宵，以夜继昼，于我而言
只是一瞬而已。

赞赏.content: 你的优秀证实了我的眼光。

亲昵.encontent:
I am not good at socializing with others, nor do I
 understand the truth behind ambiguity. Is that a loss?
亲昵.content:
我不擅长逢迎交际，也难以理解暧昧的真意。这样是一种
欠缺吗？

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
There is nothing new for trees and grass.With no eyesight,
 nor hearing, they know it all. And I will lend an
 ear to their whispers.
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
对于植物来说，大地上已再无新鲜事。它们无眼亦无耳却
知晓一切，而我会倾听它们的故事。

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
After I brew my Celtic ale, I hope everyone will appreciate
 it.
闲谈Ⅱ.content: 待我的凯尔特麦酒收获时，希望各位都能赏光一试。

独白.encontent:
Revenge is only the self-comfort of those who are drowning
 in the past, while I choose to look ahead.
独白.content:
报仇只是沉溺在过去之人的自我抚慰，而我选择了走向明
日。

入队.encontent: Let's go where trees and grass grow.
入队.content: 一同去往草木生长之地。

战前.encontent: You should not make an enemy of the earth.

择选至终的仪式.encontent: The reticent woods are watching you.
择选至终的仪式.content: 缄默的森林正注视着你。

释放神秘术Ⅱ.encontent: Frostdew is the armor of the forest.

召唤至终的仪式.encontent:
I weave the gown with thorns. You shall repay with
 sacrifice of wounds.
召唤至终的仪式.content: 荆棘编制长衫，你将以伤口献祭作为报答。

战斗胜利.encontent:
Just like the prophecies of the woods,the scales have
 already been tipped in my direction. I win today,
 and so will tomorrow.
战斗胜利.content:
如林中絮语的预言一般，胜利的天秤早已倾斜向我。今日
如此，明日亦然。

洞悉.encontent:
Thank you for showing me the beacon. It will allow
 me to go farther and deeper into the woods.
洞悉.content:
谢谢您给予我明灯，它能令我在森林中涉足得更远、更深
。

洞悉之底.encontent:
From now on, I will see and understand more. You helped
 me, and I will give you an appropriate return.
洞悉之底.content:
从此往后，我能看见与理解得更多。您帮助了我，我会给
予您适当的回报。
